snippet: By at least one metric - his chance of occupying the Oval Office - Ron Paul is doing no better than he did in 2008. But by most other yardsticks, Mr. Paul this year has far exceeded the accomplishments of his 2008 campaign, reflecting, perhaps, how...
abstract: By at least one metric - his chance of occupying the Oval Office - Ron Paul is doing no better than he did in 2008. But by most other yardsticks, Mr. Paul this year has far exceeded the accomplishments of his 2008 campaign, reflecting, perhaps, how much the mood of the country has shifted.

headline.main: A Living Autopsy of the Ron Paul Campaign
